0.Pros: Almost anyone can get hired. The work is easy and if you work at a busy one, then the time flies by.
0.Cons: Coworkers and customers can be belittling at times. And its fast food so it isn't the grandest of places to be working.

1.Pros: Pay rate is good. Very flexible schedule.
1.Cons: Very careless and reckless. Do not appreciate the hard work. They are not fair with everyone and the raises are not fair either.

2.Pros: It is a paying job, it keep you busy and you can talk to the costumer.
2.Cons: You on your feet a lot of time and you have to keep an eye on the trash can and the drink station too.

3.Pros: I think all kid should work at McDonald s as a first job so they first exaperrance
3.Cons: Short hours to some who wont to work

4.Summary: "Your work experience may vary depending on what store/franchise you go work for. Some are bad. Some are good."
4.Pros: Good first job. Helps me with the finances while I'm still in school. Made some pretty good friends and a well dedicated team on some days
4.Cons: Not recommending to make it a career unless you're trying to go for corporate or some sort of high management position.

5.Pros: Great Benefits and great opportunity to move up in the company to management positions in corporate McDonalds. Would recommend. Tough to break out of local work.
5.Cons: Greasy. The company sometimes has a bad reputation as an easy place to work or a place to work only as a backup.

6.Pros: Coworkers were friendlyDecent community to work for
6.Cons: Occasional hobo in the area would enter McD

7.Summary: "Fun, interesting, hard at times but I made it"
7.Pros: Learning how to be patient with customers.Great teamworkFast working paceKeep your work place cleanbe efficientkeep your cool
7.Cons: Rude people and people who will want to be cheap about things. Stand your ground.Know how to talk to others.

8.Summary: "Helped make decent money while I was still in school"
8.Pros: Great experience. A good foundation of work ethics and working with good people around.
8.Cons: You have to deal with all the negative attitudes, Such as customers.

9.Pros: Good food with pretty good discount.
9.Cons: The customers were very rude and not understanding.
